protein.specific_function: Casein kinases are operationally defined by their preferential utilization of acidic proteins such as caseins as substrates. It can phosphorylate a large number of proteins. Participates in Wnt signaling

reference.reference_text: Kitabayashi AN, Kusuda J, Hirai M, Hashimoto K: Cloning and chromosomal mapping of human casein kinase I gamma 2 (CSNK1G2). Genomics. 1997 Nov 15;46(1):133-7.
